## PointValues.setTag() method

Sets a tag. The caller has to ensure that both name and value are not empty and do not end with backslash.

**Signature:**

```typescript
setTag(name: string, value: string): PointValues;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | tag name |
|  value | string | tag value |

**Returns:**

[PointValues](./influxdb3-client.pointvalues.md)

this
